replies.body: Wait, why is {{champion:92}} a Noxus champion when at the end of her Broken Blade short stories she becomes Ionian?
same reason im a new zealander, cause i was born in NZ

> [{quoted}](name=hackxor9,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=yGhd5YOi,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-06-22T09:38:02.178+0000)
>
> same reason im a new zealander, cause i was born in NZ

Then why is Xin Zhao not Ionian? Or Mordekaiser not Noxian (He used to live where Noxus now stands)?
then wouldn't annie be a noxus champion
not sure if you're familiar with LoL lore, but its pretty poorly planned.

I imagine she could qualify as both, one by origin and one by allegiance.

I gather from a basic understanding of her lore than she is more taking refuge in Ionia that really being a part of their populace, so I guess that's why.

Can we get more information about the God-King Garen loading screen border, God-King Garen Icon, Crown of Lions Icon, God-King Darius loading screen border, God-King Darius Icon, Crown of Wolfs Icon, Little Lion Icon, Divine Lion Icon, Little Wolf Icon and the Forsaken Wolf Icon.

P.S. Would appreciate a picture example.
TY
Squirtlenick.
do the borders stay for ever or just until the event ends?
how to chose side? its 27th June today
